item.title: Programmatically Load an Entityform in Drupal 7

description.p: I recently had my first experience using the Entityform module in a project. It was quite easy to configure with different form types, but then I needed to embed the form into an overlay. I was expecting to use the drupal_get_form() function and render it, but this didnâ€™t work.
Here are the steps that I took to be able to load, render and embed the form.
